channel.title: Arrows -- #5 -- (Topic got spammed)
channel.description:
Okay, recently ive been working/testing alot, with my range stuff.. And this one has been a problem ({Which i can't fix}) for like ages... When i shoot someone with any bow? And there are alot of people around me, the arrow some times tends to go to a different player... Just shoots any random way every time... Is there a way to make the arrow LOCK ON to the target, only hit the target your shooting? By target, i mean enemy... NOT NPC... I couldn't care a less atm.. I just want player V player fixed for start.
If you do know the answer, could you please post? And please.. Im asking, no posts like "You have to add (EXAMPLE)"
Cause i'll be like, uhmm, ok? wtf...
P.S -- Helpful posts only please, if your going to be a jerk and post just to get your post count up, like "Oo i need this too" "Yeah ive been wondering how, if you find out, post success" "Wrong section" "HAHAHAAH NOOB" ... Dont post at all... [size=25pt]DONT SPAM THIS TOPIC! OMG[/size]
Appreciated, thanks

item.title: Arrows -- #5 -- (Topic got spammed)
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Okay, recently ive been working/testing alot, with my range stuff… And this one has been a problem ({Which i can’t fix}) for like ages… When i shoot someone with any bow? And there are alot of people around me, the arrow some times tends to go to a different player… Just shoots any random way every time… Is there a way to make the arrow LOCK ON to the target, only hit the target your shooting? By target, i mean enemy… NOT NPC… I couldn’t care a less atm… I just want player V player fixed for start.

If you do know the answer, could you please post? And please… Im asking, no posts like “You have to add (EXAMPLE)”

Cause i’ll be like, uhmm, ok? wtf…

P.S – Helpful posts only please, if your going to be a jerk and post just to get your post count up, like “Oo i need this too”
“Yeah ive been wondering how, if you find out, post success”
“Wrong section”
“HAHAHAAH NOOB”
… Dont post at all…
[size=25pt]DONT SPAM THIS TOPIC! OMG[/size]

Appreciated, thanks
